cscie55.hw3

Class Elevator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie55.hw3.Elevator

  • public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs a deterministic Elevator simulation. It runs in conjunction with Floor.java and ElevatorFullExeption.java. It utilizes a simple algorithm, changing directions only when the elevator reaches the top or bottom floors.
    Version:
    Last modified 09/24/2013
    Author:
    Antonio Recalde

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main method
        Parameters:
        args -

      • move

        private void move()
        Moves the elevator up or down depending on its current direction. Calls the stop method whenever there are requests for the elevator to stop at the current floor, or some passengers inside the elevator are destined for the current floor

      • initializeFloorsArray

        public void initializeFloorsArray()
        Initializes the floors array with Floor objects

      • initializeFloor

        public void initializeFloor(int starting_floor,
                   int number_of_passengers)
        Initializes a floor in the floors array by loading it with passengers and setting requests for this floor to "true"
        Parameters:
        starting_floor - The floor to be initialized with Passenger objects
        number_of_passengers - How many passengers will be loaded into the floor

      • requestDestination

        public void requestDestination(Passenger passenger)
        This method simulates a passenger inside the elevator pushing the button that corresponds to his floor number in the elevator's console. The destination_requests[] array is updated to true in the index that corresponds to the intended destination.
        Parameters:
        passenger - -The passenger that is requesting to stop at the particular destination

      • removeAsDestination

        public void removeAsDestination(int floor)
        This method removes the current floor as a passenger destination for the elevator
        Parameters:
        floor - -The floor that is to be removed as part of the itinerary

      • changeDirection

        private void changeDirection()
        Changes the current direction of the Elevator object

      • stop

        private void stop()
        Stops the elevator so that it can be loaded and/or unloaded

      • boardPassenger

        void boardPassenger(Passenger passenger_boarding)
              throws ElevatorFullException
        Boards a passenger from Floor.passenger_queue into the elevator
        Parameters:
        passenger_boarding - -- passenger getting into the elevator
        Throws:
        ElevatorFullException - -- whenever a full elevator tries to be loaded

        Getter method for ascending variable
